proof.contractText: self = new HashTable(capacity) catch(exc) pre: capacity >= 1 post: self.capacity = capacity & (self.size = 0 & self.<inv>) & exc = null mod: self.h.* \cup {(self, HashTable::$size)} termination: diamond

self.add(u, key) catch(exc) pre: self.size < self.capacity & (self.<inv> & !u = null) post: self.size = javaAddInt(self.size@heapAtPre, 1) & ( \exists int i; ( i >= 0 & i < self.capacity & inInt(i) & self.h[i] = u) & self.<inv>) & exc = null mod: {(self, HashTable::$size)} \cup self.h.* termination: diamond

self.add(u, key) catch(exc) pre: self.size >= self.capacity & (self.<inv> & !u = null) post: \forall int j; ( j >= 0 & j < self.capacity & inInt(j) -> self.h[j] = (self.h@heapAtPre)[j]) & self.<inv> & exc = null mod: {} termination: diamond
result = self.hash_function(val) catch(exc) pre: self.<inv> post: result >= 0 & result < self.capacity & self.<inv> & exc = null mod: {} termination: diamond
